plot: As the lease on Bruce's Malibu beach house is almost up, he and Kris must come to grips with the reality of their relationship. After 23 years of marriage, the Jenners decide that they're happier as friends--but how do they go about telling their family and the rest of the world? Meanwhile, media backlash takes its toll on Khloe in light of Lamar's continued personal problems. Plus, Kylie and Kendall struggle with processing their parents' separation in the public eye.—Anonymous
